thread.title: Hannah F. (Director of Employee Wellness)
thread.title_full: NameTagCountry.com reviewed by Hannah F. (Director of Employee Wellness)

author: Hannah F. (Director of Employee Wellness)
title: Hannah F. (Director of Employee Wellness)
text: NameTagCountry has provided us with great products and service! Their name tags are our employee's favorite. The ordering process is easy, precise, and accurate and customer service is very helpful and friendly. I was having technical issues with my account, but it was quickly fixed with a short phone call to their customer service line.
